post:
US Based VPS Services by AlphaNine- Located in Charlotte, NC and Las Vegas, NV

We now accept Bitcoin!
We just increased the monthly transfer limits on most of our KVM VPS plans.

Cisco & Juniper powered network.
All plans are unmanaged.

New KVM & OpenVZ nodes with CentOS 7 just added in April.

You can view our VPS offerings at:
[[AlphaNine.com](https://www.alphanine.com/virtual-server-services/)]

Current Specials:
[[AlphaNine Summer Specials](https://www.alphanine.com/current-specials/)]

Promotion Code Information:
The two packages below are the featured plans with a 30% recurring discount during the specified period. Even though these two packages are listed as featured specials, the coupon code is actually valid for ALL KVM, and ALL OpenVZ VPS plans that we offer. The reduced pricing is not shown in the other plans within this listing, but if you use the coupon code during the signup process, your order total will be updated to reflect the 30% recurring discount during the specified period.
